main

Class Consumat

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Consumat

  • public class Consumat
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the main() method of this program. Full simulation runs inside of the main() method by creating farm objects and making decisions for each farm. Each time period, update the farm and run the linear optimization model.
    Author:
    kellerke

      • parseInput

        public static java.util.Properties parseInput(java.lang.String[] args,
                                              boolean test)
        Parse command line input arguments for simulation control -year :: number of years of simulation
        Parameters:
        args - :: command line arguments to control the system. In this case only 1 argument
        test - :: parse the test data or the actual control.properties file
        Returns:
        prop :: return the parsed properties file as an object we can use later in the model

      • initializePopulationIncomeChangeRate

        public static void initializePopulationIncomeChangeRate(java.util.List<Farm> allFarms)
        This function initializes the income growth rate of the population (in a region) for all farms.
        Parameters:
        allFarms - :: list of all farms in region

      • updatePopulationIncomeChangeRate

        public static void updatePopulationIncomeChangeRate(java.util.List<Farm> allFarms,
                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Double> thisYearIncome)
        This function updates the income growth rates based on new income for farms.
        Parameters:
        allFarms - :: list of all farms in region
        thisYearIncome - :: list of income values for all farms
